category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ScheduleColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the Schedule Task object attributes displayed in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a Program View is opened. Valid Values: ScheduleTask.start_date - Displays start date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.finish_date - Displays finish date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.duration - Displays duration in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.work_estimate - Displays work estimate in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.task_type - Displays task type in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.constraint - Displays constraint in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.actual_start_date - Displays actual start date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.actual_finish_date - Displays actual finish date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.work_complete - Displays work complete in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.complete_percent - Displays complete percent in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.fnd0state - Displays find state in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.fnd0status - Displays find status in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.SI - Displays SI in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.object_name - Displays object name in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. ScheduleTask.ResourceAssignment - Displays resource assignment in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. predecessors - Displays predecessors in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. successors - Displays successors in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened.
